meta.content: Watch Tower Bible and Tract Society of Pennsylvania

level1.h1: Psalm 126 A Song of the Ascents.

p.span: When Jehovah gathered back the captives of Zion,We thought we were dreaming.
2 At that time our mouth was filled with laughterAnd our tongue with a joyful shout. At that time they said among the nations: “Jehovah has done great things for them.”
3 Jehovah has done great things for us,And we are overjoyed.
4 Do gather back our captives, O Jehovah,Like streams in the Negʹeb.
5 Those sowing seed with tearsWill reap with a joyful shout.
6 The one who does go out, though weeping,Carrying his bag of seed,Will surely return with a joyful shout,Carrying in his sheaves.
